ygData.subject: Re: Feign Death Skill
ygData.msgSnippet: A friend of mine has it and uses it all the time.  He thinks it s the best thing since Dual Wield...  Must be something you re doing, or maybe something with
ygData.messageBody:
A friend of mine has it and uses it all the time. He thinks it's the best
thing since Dual Wield... Must be something you're doing, or maybe
something with crocs.

Jason

-----Original Message-----
From: Seth Young [SMTP:lambastic@...]
Sent: Friday, June 11, 1999 2:00 PM
To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ-Monks] Feign Death Skill

From: Seth Young <lambastic@...>

Has anyone ever found the feign death skill to be actually useful in
getting
creatures that are attacking you to stop? I have been practicing non-stop
since I got the skill and it is now at 50, but fighting crocodiles and
caiman, not once has feigning death, whether i fell to the ground or not,
stopped them from biting me. Is there something about the use of the skill
that I am missing or is it just not that useful?
